mapper.select: select count(a.orid) as valueinfo from orders a, ir_order_product b where a.orid = b.orid and a.isdel = '0'

select a.orid,date_format(a.ordatetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as ordatetime, a.ordersum,getcodetxt('paymenttype', a.paymenttype) as paymenttype, transaction_id,c.cid, c.name as cname,d.pid,d.pname,getcodetxt('producttype',d.type) as ptype from orders a, ir_order_product b, customer c, product d where a.orid = b.orid and a.cid = c.cid and b.pid = d.pid and a.isdel = '0' order by ordatetime desc limit #{startnum},#{getrows}
